metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37298 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Shinken Solutions Shinken Monitoring Version 2.4.3 affected is vulnerable to Incorrect Access Control. The SafeUnpickler class found in shinken/safepickle.py implements a weak authentication scheme when unserializing objects passed from monitoring nodes to the Shinken monitoring server.

criterions.comment: shinken: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
